akn:section.akn:heading: Research on the impact of inflation

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Director may make awards, on a competitive merit-reviewed basis, to institutions of higher education or nonprofit organizations (or consortia of such institutions or organizations) to support research to improve our understanding of the impact of inflation.
(b) Use of funds Activities funded by an award under this section may include—

(c) Coordination to avoid duplication In making awards under this section, the Director shall, for purposes of avoiding duplication of activities and research, consult, collaborate, and coordinate with the programs and policies of other relevant Federal agencies.
